title: 9 hour wait for patching to complete?!
body:
ETA 560 minutes... you're joking right? How the hell can it take 9 hours to get a simple patch done? I have over 50 mbps stable cable connection that is wired not wifi and nothing going on to steal bandwidth yet I login and can't start a game because the LoL patch server patches at an insanely slow 23~24 kbps. If I could still play I wouldn't mind as much, but this patch won't let me play any match until its done.

...

This is NOT a fun way to spend a night. Fix your servers please! T_T

Edit: Nevermind after it got to 5% suddenly it went from 5% to 99% in a few seconds. Fastest 560 minutes ever. ;)

replies.body:
Ayyyyy sometimes those estimations can be a liiiiiiiiittle off! And by little, I mean ridiculously wrong xD! 

Glad it finally pushed itself through and you're able to play now ^_^
